content:
During the day in the eastern direction, the Russian army lost 640 people, 8 tanks and 16 BBM.

About thisinformsKhortytsky wind.

As it is noted, the forces of defense continue to inflict on the enemy losses in living strength and equipment.

In particular, in this direction of loss of Russia per day are 640 invaders, 8 tanks, 16 combat armored vehicles, 2 RSZV, 16 guns and mortars, 2 anti -tank means, 2 air defense agents, 36 units 387 UAV, 2 UAV management points.

In addition, our defenders have destroyed 24 shelters and 9 enemy ammunition.

As reported by the Armyinform, Defense ForcesDestroyedAnother Russian Mur-M surveillance complex.
title: In the east, our warriors destroyed 640 invaders, 8 tanks and almost 400 UAVs of occupiers
description: Khortytsky wind informs about it. As it is noted, the forces of defense continue to cause ...
author: Army Inform
